name: James Bond: Dr. Know Trivia Game | James Bond | 20 Questions

questions.text: Legendary James Bond producer,Albert R. Broccoli was affectionately known as who?
What legendary gadget laden Bond car has earned the name 'The Most Famous Car in the World'?
Who actually wrote the famous James Bond 'Theme' was long debated between John Barry and Monty...?
How does Oddjob die in 'Goldfinger'?
questions.explanation:
Electrocuted.

	In the vaults of Fort Knox, Bond uses Oddjob's bowler hat as a means to electrocute his opponent.

questions.text: Where was 'Thunderball' primarily shot?
Who is the bored French beauty in 'Thunderball' who serves as a mistress to Spectre's number two agent, Emilio Largo?
Composer Kurt Weill of 'The Threepenny Opera' fame, was the husband, in real life to which Bond actress?
The Aston Martin DB5 car used in 'Goldfinger' had revolving licence number plates valid in all of the following countries except...?
What is the name of the valued decoding machine that 'From Russia with Love' centres around?
What was the name of the British agent murdered with his secretary, Miss Trueblood, by three supposedly blind beggars in 'Dr No'. John...?
Which Bond film was the first one that Major Boothroyd (Q) was left out of?
questions.explanation:
Live and Let Die.

	Major Boothroyd was played in 'Dr. No' by Peter Burton. Desmond Llewelyn is better remembered in the role, which he took over in 'From Russia with Love' (credited as Boothroyd) and continued in until his death in 1999.

questions.text: What does Solitaire use to predict the future in 'Live and Let Die'?
Name the henchman of Dr.Kananga in 'Live and Let Die', a giant who had a steel arm due to losing his real arm to a crocodile years ago?
Name the Sheriff played by Clifton James in 'Live and Let Die':
Name the over the hill, old time, stand-up comedian of the night club circuit with a barrage of corny jokes in 'Diamonds are Forever'?
Name the midget henchman for Scaramanga in 'The Man with the Golden Gun'?
Which exotic island is Scaramanga's hideaway base?
What was Karl Stromberg's amphibious, undersea kingdom, power base called?
Who plays Jill Masterson and is painted gold and dies from skin suffocation in 'Goldfinger'?
Richard Kiel who played 'Jaws' reported that his steel teeth were so painful that he could only wear them for how long at a time?
